title: Veg Manchow Soup 🍜 || Warm Soup || Winter ❄️ Treat
content:
Veg Manchow Soup: Winter treat ❄️ Servings: 4  Duration : 15 mins Soup is a creamy liquid substance which can be made by combining many ingredients such as with milk, vegetables, sauce, cheese, salt , pepper & ginger- garlic these are ingredients are used to make any kind of soup, but varies from one to other cuisine. Winter is the comfort season to have warm / hot soup and snacks. This is the season to enjoy hot cup of soup in cold winter at evening time 😊 So I started winter treats to share hot soup and snacks. They are many soup varieties but today I prepared a famous and delicious soup which is veg Manchow Soup 🍜 Nutrition facts: Cauliflower: It contains vitamin C, B6, calcium, iron, magnesium, potassium and protein Celery: It contains vitamin A, C, magnesium & potassium Cabbage: It contains vitamin C & pottasium Red cabbage: It contains vitamin A,C ,B6, iron, calcium, magnesium, potassium & protein Carrot: It contains vitamin A, C, B6, calcium, iron, magnesium, potassium & protein Orange Bell Pepper: It contains vitamin A,C ,B6, iron, calcium, magnesium, potassium & protein Today I prepared Veg Manchow Soup which is sweet and sour with pepper and veggies 😀 Let's start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Carrot - chopped- 1/4 cup
  • Orange Bell pepper - finely chopped - 1/3 cup
  • Cabbage + Red cabbage - finely chopped - 1/2 cup
  • Celery - finely chopped - 1/3 cup
  • Fresh green Beans - finely chopped - 1/4 cup
  • Cauliflower - finely chopped - 1/2 cup
  • Ginger - finely chopped - 1 tb sp
  • Garlic - finely chopped - 1 tb sp
  • Soya sauce - 2 tb sp
  • Tomato sauce - 2 tb sp
  • Salt - 1 tsp
  • Pepper - fine powder - 1 tsp
  • Olive oil - 1 tb sp
Procedure:
  • Heat saucepan over medium heat
  • Add oil
  • Add ginger & garlic, Saute 1 min
  • Add all chopped veggies
  • Mix well & Saute 2 mins
  • Add 3 cups of water
  • Let it boil & add 1/2 cup water in corn flour. Mix well
  • Add pepper, salt & corn flour paste in it
  • Mix well & let it boil
  • Cook till the soup thickens
  • Soup ready
  • Veg Manchow Soup 🍜 is ready to serve
Step by step process shown below with pictures:   [caption id="attachment_6988" align="alignnone" width="1020"] Veg Manchow Soup 🍜[/caption] Checkout my other soup and snacks for cool winter: Sweet Corn 🌽 Vegetable Soup || Indo-Chinese Recipe Masala Puri 😋😀 || Street Food || South India Gobi/ Cauliflower Fry || Teatime snack Sweet Corn 🌽 Chat 😀 || Evening Snack Gobi/ Cauliflower Fry || Teatime snack Masala Papad 😀 || Starter || Evening Snack || No oil Murmura/Puffed Rice Chivda Mix || Instant || Tea ☕️ time snack Note:
  • Garnish with green spring onions
  • Serve it with fried noodles on top of the soup
